mapper.select: select book_id, title, author, FORMATDATETIME(published_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as published_date from Books where deleted_yn = 'N' order by book_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into Books(title, author, publisher, published_date, isbn, description, created_at, deleted_yn) values (#{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{publishedDate}, #{isbn}, #{description}, now(), 'N')
insert into BookImages(book_id, image_url, created_at) values (#{bookId}, #{imageUrl}, now())
mapper.select: select book_id, title, author, publisher, FORMATDATETIME(published_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as published_date, isbn, description, FORMATDATETIME(created_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as created_at, FORMATDATETIME(updated_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as updated_at from Books where deleted_yn = 'N' and book_id = #{bookId}
